Description: Ostracon, large fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is slightly grooved, the exterior is covered with a brown slip and very faint traces of many lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394688) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394688)
